name: blotchy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If someone's skin is blotchy, it is covered in marks, usually temporary ones, that are not regular in shape: He'd been crying and his face was all blotchy. She has wispy red hair and blotchy skin. See
blotch
More examplesFewer examplesHer face was all blotchy.His blotchy reddish complexion suggested he was a heavy drinker.Her red eyes and blotchy face revealed her sorrow.
